document_title: Diabetic itchy skin: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_content: Itchy skin in people with diabetes often occurs locally rather than throughout the body. Parts susceptible to itchy skin include: scalp, ankles, feet, trunk or genitals. Itching is common in diabetics with dry skin or diabetic neuropathy.
subsection_title: tieu duong bi ngua da.json. Parts prone to itchy skin
subsection_data:
tieu duong bi ngua da.json. Parts prone to itchy skin
Itchy skin in people with diabetes often occurs locally rather than throughout the body. Parts susceptible to itchy skin include: scalp, ankles, feet, trunk or genitals. Itching is common in diabetics with dry skin or diabetic neuropathy.
